In order to facilitate the use of the `dynr` package, we have created an Rstudio Server [Docker](https://www.docker.com/) container based on the [Rocker Project](https://rocker-project.org/) [@Boettiger-Eddelbuettel-2017; @Nust-Eddelbuettel-Bennett-etal-2020], with the `dynr` package pre-installed.
